sub_title: Influencer Marketing Specialist & Customer service Specialist (Spanish Markets)
summary:
Hi there!

I am an influencer marketing specialist originally from Venezuela who came to work and live in the Netherlands in 2016. I graduated with a marketing degree from CUFM, Venezuela. From 2010 to 2015, I had my first foray into the world of marketing at DIRECTV US-LATAM (https://www.directv.com/), a cable television company from the United States with regional offices in Venezuela. There, I supervised a group of 30 employees. During my tenure, my biggest achievement was the sale of 4500 devices in a single campaign.

Altogether, I got sales and customer service experience of 5 years at DIRECTV. At the beginning of 2016, I joined Crowdmobile (an Australian marketing agency in Amsterdam), as an influencer marketing assistant. While there, I have closed deals with influencers from all over Latin America, running campaigns through many social networks, such as YouTube, Instagram, and Snapchat. I have worked with fashion influencers, top channels, sports, horror, lifestyle, comedy, travel, and many other kinds of social media personalities. My greatest record during this time was bringing a turnover of over 80 thousand customers in one day for a courier service in the Mexican market.

In 2017, I was promoted to influencer marketing coordinator for the Spanish-speaking markets in Crowdmobile and continued working in said position until joining Reign as influencer marketing manager in June 2021.

In 2016, I opened my own marketing agency, which I have around 15 influencers under my management. I have called my agency Missritter, in honor of the literary character that my husband always uses to write in his personal blog.

I am very talkative, outgoing, and creative. I consider myself an animal lover, I enjoy Asian culture, plants, photography, puzzles, board games, and Latin music. In my free time, I play the piano and sings.

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for the execution, management, and quality control of multiple campaigns.
Leading the project team and mentoring mid-level and junior team members.
Reviewing campaign performance and ensuring to achieve the set KPIs.
Ensuring optimal communication within the project teams at all stages of the campaign;
Contribute to ongoing improvements of internal processes and efficiencies across teams and project team members.
Building strong relationships with clients.
Responsible for the financial requirements of my campaigns.
Planing campaigns, effectively communicating information and ideas in written and verbal format, and building and maintaining relationships.
Working closely, as the lead contact with partner social and PR agencies
Set clear objectives and measures for campaigns considering, as appropriate; reach, traffic, brand awareness, sales, audience migration, etc.
Working to the budget you will identify and liaise with relevant influencers, negotiate fair rates for plans/content, and draft influencer contracts alongside the legal team where needed
Recruiting influencers of all commercial tiers from macro Influencers to micro Influencers, as an always-on approach & strategy
Managing ongoing budget/stock sheets for reporting purposes by project, budget
Managing influencer board and process for quick reference/comms
profile_positions.title: Team Lead Manager & Senior Influencer Marketing Specialist

profile_positions.description:
• Monitoring campaigns and ensuring that you meet the KPIs for each month
• Identifying and building relationships with prominent influencers, agencies, and different brands
• Running campaigns for all kinds of influencers and agencies.
• Building strong relationships with clients during the campaign execution
• Management of the monthly budget in each of my campaigns
• Optimizing local marketing strategies were required with the focus on international markets
•  Developing, implement, and execute the international Influencer strategies to increase brand awareness, commercial growth & brand equity 
• Analyzing, recording, and evaluating campaigns to ensure all of them are making ROI 
• Tracking reporting and metrics on marketing deliverables
• Repurposing Influencer content for paid social ads
• Successful market expansion to Mexico, Colombia & Spain and other countries of Europe
• Developing and executing influencer marketing strategy
• Managing and optimizing Facebook, Instagram advertisements across markets 
• Tracking strengths and weaknesses of competitors
• Email Marketing
• Creative campaigns for all kinds of influencers.
profile_positions.title: Influencer Marketing Specialist (ES - LATAM)

profile_positions.description:
Training Spanish-speaking from Mexico, Colombia, and Spain Markets for a web service
Track internal performance and availability metrics. Make educated decisions and respond to these alerts with the measures.
Communicate internal and external information around incidents.
Drive the ongoing growth of internal incident management processes and procedures in a fast-paced environment
Work with individuals and teams across the organization to ensure the best possible customer experience.
Serve as a feedback loop for the organization, tracking the evolution of customer needs.
Reporting in order to provide feedback to improve the market
profile_positions.title: Team Leader - Customer Service (Spanish Markets)

profile_positions.description: Develop, manage and build successful and high-level influencer marketing campaigns across different platforms in Spain. Build up a successful pool of target group-relevant influencers. Explore, find and negotiate with influencers. Handle influencer communications. Brainstorm creative campaign ideas. Analyze the success of the influencer campaigns in order to adapt future campaigns if necessary.
profile_positions.title: Influencer Assistant (Spanish Markets)

profile_positions.description: • Customer service representative for international markets. • Building a good relationship and good interaction with customers. • Implementing plans to facilitate growth by planning cost-effective market development activities. • Ensuring communication and execution of company policies and legal guidelines. • Building and maintaining trust relationships with the customers, business partners, and authorities. • Responsible for technical services, content acquisitions, and also negotiating with providers. • Pro-active follow-up on the order process, ensuring timely delivery to customers of DIRECTVLATAM. • Managing invoices & follow-up payments. • Judging potential supply risks and pro-actively inform sales management. • Offering basic technical customer support. • Processing of product returns and/or customer complaints in coordination with commercial quality, supply chain, and logistics. •Informing sales management proactively about any relevant customer- or product-related information and provide order-related reports. •Intensive internal communication with sales and planning about the optimal fine-tuning of deliveries. •Serving as a mediator in cases of disputes (escalations). •Mentoring customer service representatives. •Assisting Team Lead in training and developing customer service representatives. •Stress resistance by way of coping with high peak periods..
profile_positions.title: Customer service agent, sales & troubleshooting
